post.text:
Happy Independence Day! Now, more than ever, we MUST win back our country. Our forefathers believed in what America could be and fought for it! 

It's our time to reclaim our Independence. It's OUR time to Make America Great Again! #Trump2016

Donate now to reclaim our Independence: donaldjtrump.com/4th-of-july
